component.name: ThemedIconButton
component.script:
Sub Init()
print "ThemedIconButton:Init"
m.top.showFocusFootprint = true m.top.iconUri="" m.top.focusedIconUri=""
m.top.observeFieldScoped("width", "OnSizeChanged") m.top.observeFieldScoped("height", "OnSizeChanged")
scene = m.top.getScene() themeChangeNotifier = scene.findNode("themeChangeNotifier") themeChangeNotifier.observeFieldScoped("title", "ThemeChanged")
m.top.observeFieldScoped("icon", "IconChanged")
End Sub
Sub OnSizeChanged()
print "ThemedIconButton:OnSizeChanged"
m.top.minWidth = m.top.width m.top.maxWidth = m.top.width
End Sub
Sub IconChanged()
print "ThemedIconButton:IconChanged"
m.top.focusBitmapUri = m.top.icon m.top.focusFootprintBitmapUri = m.top.icon ThemeChanged()
End Sub
Sub ThemeChanged()
print "ThemedIconButton:ThemeChanged"
m.top.getChild(0).blendColor = m.global.theme.primary
End Sub
